alert.note: Alert for Hardeman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 29 at 7:32PM CST until February 01 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM MONDAY TO NOON CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch along and north of I-40 and ice accumulations of around two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of central, east central, northwest, southeast, southern, southwest and western Oklahoma and northern Texas. * WHEN...From 6 AM Monday to noon CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Oklahoma, for the latest road conditions call 8 4 4 4 6 5 4 9 9 7. In Texas, for the latest road conditions call 800 4 5 2 9 2 9 2 for road information.
